__e: But the only way this guy will kill the story if I give him some sort of classified information...
Would anyone care to speculate how a boy could be aware of our most classified information?
It's sort of secret information I probably shouldn't tell you.
So, what, do you need me for some kind of top-secret mission or something?
Remember, this is a top-secret mission and I don't want anybody, even in your family, to know about this.
No, it has to be a secret mission.
It's getting really hard to keep track of who knows whose secret identity.
Claims the Man of Steel has a secret identity and that he knows what it is.
It's not just a secret identity to me.
Okay, I didn't want to have to tell you, but... there's a secret organization that's obsessed with the same creature you've been studying.
Told you I worked for a secret organization?
An organization in Paris, which I mustn't name, will know where we are.
Said he had gambling debts and that he was being blackmailed into supplying highly classified data to someone.
Or maybe you want my thoughts on you sneaking Vasquez and that bomb into our office to steal classified Intel from an FBI server.
It was carrying sensitive data that we didn't want the Canadians to find.
Why did I think there were whistle-blowing documents in it?
What I've pieced together is that in the last few months, some highly classified documents that were under the supervision of the Doctor have been tampered with.
Is it my fault nobody told me I was delivering top secret government documents?
